title: Controllable Text Generation for Large Language Models: A Survey
details: X Liang, H Wang, Y Wang, S Song, J Yang, S Niu, J Hu… - arXiv preprint arXiv …, 2024
abstract: In Natural Language Processing (NLP), Large Language Models (LLMs) have demonstrated high text generation quality. However, in real-world applications, LLMs must meet increasingly complex requirements. Beyond avoiding misleading or …
